Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; below, white band; exterior: at rim, dot frieze between pairs of dilute lines; below, head of sphinx, to left; part of elaborate rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 257, no. 465, pl. 63)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0526) (phase 2)
